text: وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَأٓتَيۡنَا كُلَّ نَفۡسٍ هُدَىٰهَا وَلَٰكِنۡ حَقَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ مِنِّي لَأَمۡلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجۡمَعِينَ

translation.en: And if We had willed, We could have given every soul its guidance, but the word from Me will come into effect [that] "I will surely fill Hell with jinn and people all together
translation.id: Dan jika Kami menghendaki niscaya Kami berikan kepada setiap jiwa petunjuk (bagi)nya, tetapi telah ditetapkan perkataan (ketetapan) dari-Ku, "Pasti akan Aku penuhi neraka Jahanam dengan jin dan manusia bersama-sama
